data.title: Jodean Bottom: The tragic story of Joaquin and River Phoenix's sister
data.meta_description: Jodean Bottom came to the spotlight after the Phoenix family broke the story of her being their half-sibling. Learn more about her background and where she was.
data.text:
If you have watched Hollywood movies, you are likely aware of Joaquin and River Phoenix. They are popular in the movie industry as they have appeared in various productions where they performed amazingly well. But how much do you know about their half-sister, Jodean Bottom? She is not as high-profile as her half-siblings; hence much is unknown about her. So, what is Jodean’s story?

Jodean has an interesting story that you will hardly believe. Jodean’s siblings haven't had it smooth either, as they survived a tragic experience, which made them alter their names as they started a new life in the United States of America. So, who is Jodean Bottom?

Jodean Bottom’s profile summary

NameJodean BottomNicknameJodeanDate of birthFebruary 29, 1964Age58 years oldPlace of birthAmadora, PortugalCurrently residingThe United States of AmericaZodiac signPiscesNationalityAmericanParentsJohn Lee Bottom (father), Trinity (biological mother), and Arlyn Phoenix (stepmother)SiblingsThe late River Phoenix, Joaquin Phoenix, Rain Phoenix, Liberty Phoenix, Summer Phoenix Marital statusSingleChildren1 daughter

Who is Jodean Bottom?

Jodean Bottom is the half-sibling of Joaquin and River Phoenix. She was born on February 29, 1964, in Andora, Portugal. This means that she is 58 years old in 2022.

Who is Jodean Bottom's mother? Jodean is the daughter of John Lee and his girlfriend, Trinity. Her mother gave birth to her while in Amadora, Portugal. Unfortunately, John, her father, fled Canada before her birth, fearing being recruited into the army to fight in the Vietnam war. Therefore, she never got a chance to interact with her father.

Jodean lived a low-key life until she got public attention after her brother discovered he had his sister. Jodean’s stepmother is Arlyn Phoenix, renowned as an American social media activist and mother of popular actors.

Jodean Bottom's siblings are popular actors

Jodean Bottom is the half-sibling of the Phoenix family of actors made up of Joaquin Phoenix, Liberty Phoenix, Summer Phoenix, Rain Phoenix, and the late River Phoenix. They share a common father, John Lee Bottom. So, what is the Jodean sibling’s profile?

River Phoenix

River Phoenix is the eldest son of John. He was born on August 23, 1970, and is 52 years old as of 2022. River started acting when he was ten, and his first breakthrough came in the movie Support Me. He has starred in amazing productions such as Indiana Jones and Running Empty.

On top of being an actor, River Phoenix was a popular musician, and he formed a band called Aleka Attic. River passed away on October 31, 1993.

Rain Phoenix

Rain Phoenix is Jodean’s half-sister, and she was born on November 21, 1972, in Texas. She is also an actress and musician. Rain started her music career at a young age, and at 15, she had already formed the band Aleka’s Attic with her elder brother, River.

Joaquin Phoenix

Joaquin is the most popular in the Phoenix family, considering his immense success in the movie industry. He was born on October 28, 1974, in San Juan, Puerto Rico, and he is an actor, singer, and animal activist.

Joaquin won the best actor award at the Venice International Film Festival for his role in The Master. He is also renowned for his amazing portrayal in the psychological thriller, The Joker.

Liberty Phoenix

Liberty is the fourth child in the Phoenix family, born on July 5, 1976. She is also an actress and started her career in the 1980s. On top of acting, Liberty sings and is now the manager of River Phoenix Centre for Peacebuilding, a charity organization founded by her mother.

Summer Phoenix

Summer was born on December 10, 1978, and is the youngest in the family. Jodean Bottom's sister has appeared in various notable productions over the years that have allowed her to stamp her authority in the movie industry.

Why does Jodean Bottom’s family have a different last name?

The Phoenix family has had a tumultuous history, and you wouldn't believe it, considering how popular they are today. Their family joined the Children of God cult and moved to Crocket, Texas, to reside in its central commune. Then, John was the cult's Archbishop.

The cult started preaching weird practices and the family decided to escape. They were smuggled into the United States of America on a trolley-filled freighter, which dropped them in Englewood, Florida, to live with Alyn's parents.

Since the family escaped the cult, they changed their last name from Bottom to Phoenix. The change was meant to signify the beginning of a new life. After they settled in California, a talent agent spotted them and chose to represent the four Phoenix siblings, which was a major success.

What happened to Jodean Bottom?

Joaquin Phoenix's sister was abandoned by her father when she was small. Therefore, she grew up without a father figure. It wasn't until later in her life that she was discovered by River Phoenix, who took it upon himself to bring her home.

The Phoenix family welcomed her with open arms. Jodean came with her child, but her identity is unknown. It is unclear whether Jodean is married, as the Phoenix family keeps her details private and supports her low-key nature.

Jodean Bottom's net worth

Considering her low-key nature and absence from the spotlight all her life, it is hard figuring out Jodean’s fortune. Her half-siblings are popular and successful actors that have made good fortune in the movie industry. According to Celebrity Net worth, her half-brother, Joaquin Phoenix, has an estimated net worth of $60 million.

Jodean Bottom is the long-lost sister of the renowned Phoenix family, who are all successful in the entertainment industry. She shares the same father with the family, and they were glad to find out about her after many years of separation.
